title: Got A 14 Day Suspension
body: So apparently saying Nice one Tf (for twisted fate) and suggesting a song which was naruto blue bird remix can get you a 14 day suspension

replies.body: Hey man, I took a look at your chat logs and they were pretty intense.  :/  You can check your reform card when logging back into the client, but that chat I saw were severely offensive towards others.  You're welcome to also reach out to our PB team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you'd like to discuss this with them.
